input.sentences: the awards ceremony and graduation was today .
everyone stood up at the front proudly .
the principal congratulated all of the kids .
they decided to make their final goodbyes to the teachers
output.sentences: We sat in the back of the auditorium for the graduation ceremony awards
next we walked up to the front and we stood proudly waiting for our diplomas to be handed to us
The principal then comes out with a piece of paper giving the graduates confirmation  they've graduated
The students then go and sit in a classroom with smiles on their faces
Finally, they take a group selfie together with their hands in a peace sign
